member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.MessageStrings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.MessageStrings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.MessageStrings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.MessageStrings.ControllerNameRequired
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Controller Name is required.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.MessageStrings.EmptyControllerNameRequired
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Controller name is required for an Empty Controller.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.MessageStrings.FileExists_useforce
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The file {0} exists, use -f option to overwrite.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.MessageStrings.InvalidNamespaceName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The namespace name '{0}' is not valid..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.MessageStrings.ProvideValidArgument
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Please provide a valid {0}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.MessageStrings.Scaffolding_additionalSteps
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There may be additional steps required for the generated code to work. Refer to <forward-link>.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.MessageStrings.ScaffoldingSuccessful_unregistered
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Scaffolding generated all the code but the new context created could be registered using dependency injection..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.MessageStrings.TemplateNameRequired
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The TemplateName cannot be empty.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.MessageStrings.TypeDoesNotExist
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A type with the name {0} does not exist.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.MessageStrings.ValidationSuccessfull_modelUnset
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Validation succeded but model type not set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.MessageStrings.ViewNameRequired
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The ViewName cannot be empty".

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.NameSpaceUtilities.GetSafeNameSpaceName(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a namespace name to a safe namespace name.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.NameSpaceUtilities.GetSafeNameSpaceFromPath(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Converts a path like a/b/c/d to namespace like a.b.c.d

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.RoslynUtilities.CreateEscapedIdentifier(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an escaped identifier if the identifier is a keyword (or contextual keyword) in C#.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.CommonGeneratorBase
member.summary: Common generator functionality for Controllers and Views

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.Controller.MvcController
member.summary: MvcController class provides basic functionality for scaffolding an MVC controller. The specific type of controller (Empty, Controller with read write actions etc, need to provide the template names to be used for scaffolding.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.Dependency.DependencyGenerator
member.summary: This is create to test the functionality but this should go away perhaps. For testing using this just make this class implement ICodeGenerator interface. Eventually this class should just be removed.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGenerators.Mvc.View.ViewGenerator
member.summary: Both the command line entry point for View generation (implements ICodeGenerator with Alias attribute) and View generator itself (extends CommonGeneratorBase). Consider separating if there are going to multiple view generators like Controllers.
